message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I think you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $150?
I understand that $200 is a bit high for you, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about $175?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but $175 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $160?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. How about we meet at $165?
I'm getting close to walking away, but I really want this product. Would you be willing to meet me at $155?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $162. This is my final offer, but I'm willing to sell to you at this price
